name: .CPVC File Extension
summary: Learn about .CPVC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A CPVC file is a video composition created and used by Captivate, a program used to develop interactive eLearning products. It contains a video clip that can be copied, cut, or trimmed. CPVC files may also include text captions, non-interactive objects, smart shapes, images, animations, and highlight boxes.

content: CPVC Captivate Video Compositions are similar to .CPTX Captivate Projects but is not based on the "slide" paradigm. After you record the video in a CPVC file, you can see it in the timeline.
NOTE: You can publish CPVC files to YouTube or as an .MP4 file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
